name: Quest for Rolls
description:
In Quest for Rolls you play as an energetic dice with one goal; bake a roll. Navigate your physics based character around a low poly world, collecting ingredients that you'll need to bake the perfect roll!

Controls;

Keyboard; WASD to Move, Mouse to Look, Space to Jump and Double Jump, Escape to Open the Menu, and T to Unstuck.

Xbox Controller; Left Stick to Move, Right Stick to Look, A to Jump, all other controls require a keyboard.

*Please note, if you are having performance problems you may need to confirm that Hardware Acceleration is enabled in your browser. Additionally, a Desktop version is also available which should help fix any performance issues.
